title: Inside Sales Representative
description:
**Job Description**

**About Company:**

Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue of approximately $44 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner, and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving analytical challenges, growing efficiency in their laboratories, improving patient health through diagnostics, or developing and manufacturing life-changing therapies, we are here to support them. Our distributed team delivers an outstanding combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience, and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services, Patheon, and PPD. Our Innovative Laboratory technologies & Services makes it easier for customers.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Get a full understanding of the capabilities of the company under Biosciences Division
* Act as an ambassador of Thermo Fisher Scientific and fully embrace the things we value.
* Build long-term, productive, and mutually helpful relationships with new and existing customers
* Onboarding new accounts
* Provide reports on a regular basis as requested. Such reports will include customer connection reports, performance to targets, project progress, SFDC updates etc..
* Optimally plan your time to improve impact
* Build large opportunity leads and actively follow-up quotations with the aim of improving numbers and conversion rates
* Must maintain high ethical standards to support a professional business code of conduct.
* Connect with customers periodically using tools like telephone, Emails etc
* Collaborate with TSS/BDMs/Marketing to generate opportunities & follow up with the concerned distributors.
* Use data analytics tools to scout for business opportunities.

**Benefits**


We offer competitive remuneration, annual incentive plan bonus, healthcare, and a range of employee benefits. Thermo Fisher Scientific offers employment with an innovative, forward-thinking organization, and outstanding career and development prospects. We offer an exciting company culture that stands for integrity, intensity, involvement, and innovation!

**At Thermo Fisher Scientific, each one of our 70,000 extraordinary minds have a unique story to tell. Apply today http://jobs.thermofisher.com.**

**ThermoFisher is committed to crafting a diverse work environment that values and respects individuals from all backgrounds.**

**Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.**

title: Die Cast Engineer
description:
**Working at Freudenberg:** "We will wow your world!" This is our promise. As a global technology group, we not only make the world cleaner, healthier and more comfortable, but also offer our 51,000 employees a networked and diverse environment where everyone can thrive individually. Be surprised and experience your own wow moments.
  
  

Chem-Trend, a company of the Freudenberg Group, is a global leader in the development, manufacture and marketing of specialized release agents, purging compounds and related processing aids, with manufacturing and R & D operations in North and South America, Europe and Asia that are supported by its headquarters in Michigan, USA. Chem-Trend has a singular focus of providing innovative solutions for the die casting, polyurethane, rubber, composites, tire, thermoplastic and wood composite industries.
  
  

Some of your Benefits
  
  

Health Insurance
  
  

**Health Insurance:** Rely on comprehensive services whenever you need it.
  
  

Diversity & Inclusion
  
  

**Diversity & Inclusion:** We focus on providing an inclusive environment and recognize our diversity contributes to our success.
  
  

Safe Environment
  
  

**Safe Environment:** We strive to ensure safety remains a top priority, and provide a stable environment for our employees.
  
  

Personal Development
  
  

**Personal Development:** We offer a variety of trainings to ensure you can develop in your career.
  
  

Sustainability & Social Commitment
  
  

**Sustainability & Social Commitment:** We support social and sustainable projects and encourage employee involvement.
  
  

India - Remote
  
  

Remote
  
  

Chem-Trend Chemicals Co. Pvt. Ltd.
  
  

You support our team as
  
  

Sales Manager - Die casting (F/M/D)
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

Manage a team of direct sales personnel to grow market share; m
  
  

Meet or exceed segment’s annual business performance indicators mainly Sales, Gross Margin, Inventory & Receivables
  
  

Sell all assigned product lines to customers to secure market-place position.
  
  

Utilize purchase agreements and long-term contracts to prevent competitors from selling low margin products and placing profitable products at risk.Diffuse competitive threats at key accounts with a sense of urgency.
  
  

Collaborate internally (Global Business development director, R&D, Sales) to develop new products and improve existing products to meet customer needs.
  
  

Establish good working relationships with plant personnel and management contacts at customer accounts.
  
  

Support Sales Representatives and customers with timely problem-solving and general product information.
  
  

Channel partner management and working closely with them for the regional business growth.
  
  

Develop sales and value selling skills to assigned customers.
  
  

Monitor activity of new product introductions to bring forth timely testing of new products into the field.
  
  

Assist sales force in completing Technical Assistance Request (TAR)’s and product development requests and coordinate with the lab to ensure the urgency and priority of these requests.
  
  

Qualifications
  
  

Graduate/Post Graduate in engineering, Science, or Business, or equivalent experience in a Multi National Company.
  
  

10 -12 years of experience in sales and marketing, preferably in the chemical specialty field and experience in a leadership or competitive function.

title: Sales Leader
description:
**Job Description**


Job Description
Objective: To achieve the sales (Primary and Secondary), distribution and merchandising objectives for the specified routes, through a team of Market Growth Representatives for a key market (volume and image)


Title: Team Leader Sales


Function: Sales


Work Location: Calicut


Job Responsibilities
1. Sales Plan Execution:  

a) Coordinate and achieve sales objectives for assigned Territory routes by brand and pack on a daily basis for secondary, primary volumes (Physical Cases & unit Cases), Gross revenue (GR) & Net revenue (NR)  

b) Define route plans of the Market Growth Representatives, Account Developers to optimize coverage cost effectively and ensure adequate productivity.  

2. Customer Management: Drive Relationship with Outlets through the team of Market growth representative and Account Developers to ensure sustained business.  

3. Market Expansion:  

a) Drive Horizontal Expansion with respect to number of outlets opened versus target to improve business in the coming years.  

b) Take up the responsibility of opening new outlets during market visits and provide necessary support in terms of elements, discounts, coolers etc.  

c) Drive conversion of high value/ high visibility outlets to Depth Outlets (Happy Deal, Vision 2020, Teen & College Outlets, Outlets in Emerging Channels) and ensure execution as per Company norms  

d) Market share gain through various ground level interventions such as driving outlet level billing vertically & horizontally.  

4. Market Execution: Execute Channel Programmers, Promotional activities for the given set of outlets. Plan for merchandising elements, coolers based on outlets/ market requirements and as per the RED standards. Prepare MGR wise action plans for improving RED (Right Execution) parameters, HE etc.  

5. People Management:  

a) Carry out on job trainings with Market growth representatives (Off Role) to improve Execution skills on the job. Track PJP (Permanent Journey Plan) Compliance and other productivity Metrics of the team and provide inputs to improve the same via OJT  

b) Evaluate performance and skills of MDs and provide inputs via on-the-job coaching, training etc.  

c) Conduct Joint Weekly, Monthly Review with ASM to review performance wrt Sales, Execution Parameters of MDs and work on agreed actions.  

d) Review Performance and market issues to be resolved via daily Gate Meetings
6. Budget Management:  

Propose Discount spend for given set of outlets to drive business. Closely monitor customer outstanding and claims and ensure compliance to credit and other policies.  

7. Asset Control: Ensure regular tracking of our Assets and ensure asset movements etc in compliance to the Asset Policy.  

8. Distribution Management: In routine ensure monitoring distributor ROI, SKU wise margins, DMS (Distribution Management System), scheme spend distributor to market outlets.* 


Supervises: Market Growth Representatives and Account Developers


Direct Reports: No


Grade (Internal Reference): 7


Geographical Scope: Calicut


Reports To: Area Sales Manager


Business Knowledge: Knowledge of Sales & Distribution preferably in an FMCG Company


Job Requirement
Qualification: Graduation or MBA


Experience: 4 - 8 years


Travel: Continuous travel within the designated area – 80% Travel in a month

**Job Requirement**

title: Product Manager
description:
**Job Description**
-------------------

  

Designs, develops and manages activities for a specific product or group of products from product definition and planning through production, release, and end of life. Serves as the central resource with design, process, manufacturing, test, quality and marketing as the product(s) move to production and distribution. Involvement lasts throughout all stages of a product's lifecycle including modifications, upgrades and maintenance of the product or product line. Works closely with product development to create products and validates product definitions with external customers and sales. Uses technical expertise and extensive industry experience to formulate product strategies and identify new product opportunities. Responsible for developing project plans designed to address customer needs and/or expand market share.  

**Qualifications**
------------------

  

Minimum qualifications are required to be initially considered for this position. Preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum requirements and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates. Minimum Qualifications: Bachelor or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related field. 4+ years of technical product management experience with at least 2+ years of end-to-end product delivery experience with cross functional teams. Advanced English level. Preferred Qualifications: Software Development background preferred. Familiarity with JIRA tool.  

**Inside this Business Group**
------------------------------

  

Intel's Information Technology Group (IT) designs, deploys and supports the information technology architecture and hardware/software applications for Intel. This includes the LAN, WAN, telephony, data centers, client PCs, backup and restore, and enterprise applications. IT is also responsible for e-Commerce development, data hosting and delivery of Web content and services.  

**Posting Statement**
---------------------

  

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, religious creed, sex, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, military and veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, gender, gender expression, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by local law, regulation, or ordinance.  

**Benefits**
------------

  

We offer a total compensation package that ranks among the best in the industry. It consists of competitive pay, stock, bonuses, as well as, benefit programs which include health, retirement, and vacation. Find more information about all of our Amazing Benefits here.  

  

It has come to our notice that some people have received fake job interview letters ostensibly issued by Intel, inviting them to attend interviews in Intel’s offices for various positions and further requiring them to deposit money to be eligible for the interviews. We wish to bring to your notice that these letters are not issued by Intel or any of its authorized representatives. Hiring at Intel is based purely on merit and Intel does not ask or require candidates to deposit any money. We would urge people interested in working for Intel, to apply directly at https://jobs.intel.com/ and not fall prey to unscrupulous elements.  

**Working Model**
-----------------

  

This role will be eligible for our hybrid work model which allows employees to split their time between working on-site at their assigned Intel site and off-site. **In certain circumstances the work model may change to accommodate business needs.**  

JobType


Hybrid

title: Logistics Manager
description:
Location: Ballabgarh  

Goodyear Talent Acquisition Representative: Aanchal Seth  

Sponsorship Available: No  

Relocation Assistance Available: Yes

**Primary Purpose of the Position**


Accountable for the end to end supply chain blocks of work associated with Logistics and Plant warehousing. managing transport vendors, and 3 PL Service provider who is handling plant FG Storage. Collaborating with plant, functional stakeholders, business teams and warehouses to deliver aligned PBU goals and objectives related to EBIT, supplies, product availability, inventory quality and customer service.


Ensure Safe work practices With the help of sales forecast, ensure to plan daily truck placement activities for delivery on time. Develop review mechanism to ensure availability of required inventoy.


Drive warehouse processes for proper hygyne of finished goods’ storage through 3 PL Service provider. With the help of Supply Planning Manager , develop an aligned supply plan, taking the inputs from the consensus demand planning process, and desired inventory quality with an objective to plan and deliver the right tires to the right customers at the right time, right place and in the right quantities. Sustain routine checks and processes to ensure integrity of stock quality.


With help of set processes, ensure to have Daily Cycle count and ensure to have 100% FG Inventory accuracy. Drive and set process of Monthly / quarterly review of all Service providers & Transportation vendors, and ensure to give appropriate feedback for continuous improvement. Drive improvements through productivity and cost saving measures.


Take overall charge for deliveries, encompassing plant logistics & warehouse, export / import activities in consultation with Manager T&W, and deliver on operation efficiency, productivity and cost savings.

 **Primary Duties/Responsibilities**

* Lead the daily truck placement and on time delivery of right tires at right place. Regular follow up with Transporters for placement of Vehicles. Ensure complete adherence to SOPs for loading and unloading including Quality Checks, Security, etc.
* Ensure smooth plant FG warehouse operation though 3 PL service provider. Coordination with cross functional team members within and out side plant to ensure smooth Logistics operation.
* Provide rgular guidance and conduct training for warehouse staff to ensure safety, work hygiene and smooth conduct of day today work / safety awareness along with compliance awareness.
* Daily / weekly / weekly provisions, MIS for Cost and Disaptches.
* Be well-versed and knowledgeable in inventory planning , customer requirements . Be responsible for data maintenance, Provision.

  



Goodyear is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to that individual's race, color, religion or creed, national origin or ancestry, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, ethnicity, citizenship, or any other characteristic protected by law.


Goodyear is one of the world’s largest tire companies. It employs about 74,000 people and manufactures its products in 57 facilities in 23 countries around the world. Its two Innovation Centers in Akron, Ohio and Colmar-Berg, Luxembourg strive to develop state-of-the-art products and services that set the technology and performance standard for the industry. For more information about Goodyear and its products, go to www.goodyear.com/corporate

title: Technical Sales Manager
description:
**Working at Freudenberg:** "We will wow your world!" This is our promise. As a global technology group, we not only make the world cleaner, healthier and more comfortable, but also offer our 51,000 employees a networked and diverse environment where everyone can thrive individually. Be surprised and experience your own wow moments.
  
  

SurTec, a company of the Freudenberg Group, is a leading provider of chemical specialities for surface treatment, with manufacturing facilities in Europe, North and South America and Asia, operating in more than 20 countries with its own subsidiaries and a global distribution network. Headquartered in Germany, the company serves four fields of application – Industrial Parts Cleaning, Metal Pre-treatment, Functional and Decorative Electroplating. We offer a highly comprehensive portfolio in these sectors and supply almost all segments, industries and markets dealing with advanced surface treatment.
  
  

Some of your Benefits
  
  

Diversity & Inclusion
  
  

**Diversity & Inclusion:** We focus on providing an inclusive environment and recognize our diversity contributes to our success.
  
  

Health Insurance
  
  

**Health Insurance:** Rely on comprehensive services whenever you need it.
  
  

Safe Environment
  
  

**Safe Environment:** We strive to ensure safety remains a top priority, and provide a stable environment for our employees.
  
  

Sustainability & Social Commitment

Personal Development

Pune
  
  

Remote
  
  

SurTec Chemicals India Pvt. Ltd.
  
  

You support our team as
  
  

Assistant Manager/Area Manager - Sales & Technical service (F/M/D)
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

**Commercial Focus:** Manage defined sales and account responsibility within a defined territory, market segment and field of application, industry or specifically assigned accounts.
  
  

Multi annual experience in sales of Industrial parts cleaning, Paints, Electro Plating products and expert knowledge in one or more fields of application and/or comparable knowledge in sales of chemical specialties.
  
  

Function as a company representative with a strong sense of professionalism and customer service.
  
  

This role is responsible for tracking of trends and relevant markets as well as ensure entering new markets or applications and continuous expansion of presence on the market.
  
  

Managing projects for business development, coordinate activities with internal and external partners and for pro-active new customer acquisition, identification of customer requirements/specifications.
  
  

Negotiate contracts and prices on national and international level and ensure compliance with agreements.
  
  

Build new, close relations to customers, suppliers and service providers to create new markets and secure the market position.
  
  

Hands on experience in handling independently with sales and customer service.
  
  

Qualifications
  
  

Graduation / Post Graduation in Chemistry with 10+ years of experience in Industrial parts cleaning, Paints, Electro Plating Industry.
  
  

Good communication skills in English speaking & writing.
  
  

Local language is Mandatory.

Hands on experience in MS Office.

title: Field Manager
description:
Job Description

**Associate Field Manager**

* Demand generation for Ruminant products in trade (from Vets/paravets/shepherds etc).
* Selling these products by using pharma sell/action selling process steps.
* Coordinating between retailers and distributors.
* Minimizing expiries by regular secondary sales.
* Laison with vet colleges & Institution.
* Development of good rapport with Milk union and other NGO''s for business volumes.
* Responsible for outstanding/recoveries pertaining to Ruminant products for their territory.
* Compliance to Business Principles.
* The Sales Executive is responsible for maintaining sales growth for Ruminants products in their respective territory.
* Achieving annual target, in addition to this regular customer follow up like Vets, DF's, Shepherds, paravets, retailers and distributors.
* Growth and expansion of Ruminant products to make our company as leading company in the territory against increasing competition phase. Attaining desired growth as per traffic light model.

  

Any Graduate, preferred to have degree in Veterinary Science/Science background, 2 or more years relevant experience in the ethical veterinary market.


Sound technical knowledge of Animal Health Medicine Associate Field Manager, familiar with Animal health sales process and related scientific knowledge. Should have knowledge of geography of territory.

  

Our Animal Health Division is a trusted global leader in veterinary medicine, dedicated to preserving and improving health, well-being, and performance of animals and the people who care for them. We are a global team of professionals working together to make a positive difference in animal care and the world’s food supply and have a deep sense of responsibility towards our customers, consumers, animals, society, and our planet.

  

Through our commitment to The Science of Healthier Animals®, we offer veterinarians, farmers, pet owners and governments one of the widest ranges of veterinary pharmaceuticals, vaccines and health management solutions and services as well as an extensive suite of digitally connected identification, traceability and monitoring products. We invest in dynamic and comprehensive R&D resources and a modern, global supply chain. We are present in more than 50 countries, while our products are available in some 150 markets.

  

We are proud to be a company that embraces the value of bringing diverse, talented, and committed people together. The fastest way to breakthrough innovation is when diverse ideas come together in an inclusive environment. We encourage our colleagues to respectfully challenge one another’s thinking and approach problems collectively. We are an equal opportunity employer, committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
### **Job Information**


Industry


**IT Services**City


**Pune City**State/Province


**Maharashtra**Country


**India**Zip/Postal Code


**411001**### **About us**


CloudAngles is an IP-driven services company that brings a wealth of expertise and a rigid sense of purpose that provides an empirical and innovation-driven perspective to customer's digital transformation journey. We have over 500+ yrs. of collective experience within our executive team across IT leadership, engineering, consulting, and services which sets the baseline for delivering end-user experiences that are differentiated.  

  

  

Everyday, our People of Change accomplishes extraordinary feats by pursuing our shared mission — to deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity.  

  

  

Utilizing advanced technologies, data, and artificial intelligence, we create 360-degree value for our clients, employees, and communities across all industries and regions of the world.  

  



Join our team — bring your ideas, creativity, and determination to make a difference, and together we'll solve some of the world's greatest problems.  

  



  

  

  

### **Job Description**


**What you will be doing**  



Develop core versions of software applications for sale to external clients in SaaS as well On-premises. Identifies Business and technical specifications through Product Management and/or client representatives. Interacts with engineering groups to assist in design and development/enhancement to software.  

  



* It translates to being engaged in several projects with focus on timely delivery, quality, productivity.
* Good hands on experience on Java/JEE/Spring/Struts/HTML5/Angular/Oracle/REST Service.
* Domain Knowledge on Investment Accounting would be an added advantage.

 **GENERAL KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS & ABILITIES**

* Knowledge of FIS products and services; in-depth knowledge of products and services in assigned line(s) of business
* Knowledge of financial services industry
* Knowledge of end-to-end systems development life cycles, e.g., waterfall, iterative and other modern approaches to software development
* In-depth understanding of Java, JEE design patterns and their application
* Fluency in developing and understanding sequence diagrams, class models, UML etc.
* Working knowledge in JEE, Struts, Spring, JMS, Core java
* Knowledge of HTML5, AngularJS, jQuery, REST web services is must. Should have worked in Agile methodology.
* Proficiency in solutions design and requirements definition disciplines leveraging model driven design based tools and techniques including conceptual solution component models, business process models, use cases, etc.
* Outstanding verbal and written communication skills to technical and non-technical audiences of various levels in the organization, e.g., executive, management, individual contributors
* Excellent analytical, decision-making, problem-solving, team and time management skills
* Ability to persuade and influence others on the best approach to take
* Ability to estimate work effort for project sub-plans or small projects and ensure the project is successfully completed
* Positive outlook, strong work ethic, and responsive to internal and external clients and contacts
* Willingly and successfully fulfills the role of teacher, mentor and coach

title: Software Engineer
description:
Comcast brings together the best in media and technology. We drive innovation to create the world's best entertainment and online experiences. As a Fortune 50 leader, we set the pace in a variety of innovative and fascinating businesses and create career opportunities across a wide range of locations and disciplines. We are at the forefront of change and move at an amazing pace, thanks to our remarkable people, who bring cutting-edge products and services to life for millions of customers every day. If you share in our passion for teamwork, our vision to revolutionize industries and our goal to lead the future in media and technology, we want you to fast-forward your career at Comcast. **Job Summary**


Responsible for planning and designing new software and web applications. Analyzes, tests and assists with the integration of new applications. Documents all development activity. Assists with training non-technical personnel. Has in-depth experience, knowledge and skills in own discipline. Usually determines own work priorities. Acts as a resource for colleagues with less experience.**Job Description**


Technical Skills Required: Java, Spring Boot, Rest API, JavaScript, Angular / React.


Experience: 5 years to 7.5 years


Job Location: Chennai


HR Contact: Ramesh\\_M2@comcast.com

**Core Responsibilities**

* Collaborates with project stakeholders to identify product and technical requirements. Conducts analysis to determine integration needs.
* Designs new software and web applications, supports applications under development and customizes current applications. Assists with the software update process for existing applications and roll-outs of software releases.
* Participates in training representatives and operations staff on internally developed software applications.
* Researches, writes and edits documentation and technical requirements, including software designs, evaluation plans, test results, technical manuals and formal recommendations and reports.
* Monitors and evaluates competitive applications and products. Reviews literature, patents and current practices relevant to the solution of assigned projects.
* Provides technical leadership throughout the design process and guidance with regards to practices, procedures and techniques. Serves as a guide and mentor for junior-level Software Development Engineers.
* Works with Quality Assurance team to determine if applications fit specification and technical requirements.
* Displays in-depth knowledge of engineering methodologies, concepts, skills and their application in the area of specified engineering specialty.
* Displays in-depth knowledge of and ability to apply, process design and redesign skills. Presents and defends architectural, design and technical choices to internal audiences.
* Displays knowledge of and ability to apply, project management skills.
* Consistent exercise of independent judgment and discretion in matters of significance.
* Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) and overtime as necessary.
* Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.

**Employees at all levels are expected to:**

* Understand our Operating Principles; make them the guidelines for how you do your job.
* Own the customer experience - think and act in ways that put our customers first, give them seamless digital options at every touchpoint, and make them promoters of our products and services.
* Know your stuff - be enthusiastic learners, users and advocates of our game-changing technology, products and services, especially our digital tools and experiences.
* Win as a team - make big things happen by working together and being open to new ideas.
* Be an active part of the Net Promoter System - a way of working that brings more employee and customer feedback into the company - by joining huddles, making call backs and helping us elevate opportunities to do better for our customers.
* Drive results and growth.
* Respect and promote inclusion & diversity.
* Do what's right for each other, our customers, investors and our communities.

**Disclaimer:**

* This information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees in this role. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications.


Comcast is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We will consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by applicable law.

 **Education**


Bachelor's Degree


While possessing the stated degree is preferred, Comcast also may consider applicants who hold some combination of coursework and experience, or who have extensive related professional experience.

**Relevant Work Experience**


5-7 Years

  

Base pay is one part of the Total Rewards that Comcast provides to compensate and recognize employees for their work. Most sales positions are eligible for a Commission under the terms of an applicable plan, while most non-sales positions are eligible for a Bonus. Additionally, Comcast provides best-in-class Benefits. We believe that benefits should connect you to the support you need when it matters most, and should help you care for those who matter most. That’s why we provide an array of options, expert guidance and always-on tools, that are personalized to meet the needs of your reality – to help support you physically, financially and emotionally through the big milestones and in your everyday life. Please visit the compensation and benefits summary on our careers site for more details.

title: Sales Representative
description:
**About Seed-X Technologies:**  
At Seed-X Technologies, we leverage GeNee™, our proprietary AI, to analyze seed quality, driving advancements in crop yields, efficiency, and sustainability. Our mission is to empower the agricultural sector through innovation, and we're looking for passionate individuals to join us in transforming the industry.

**Role Summary:**  
As a Sales Representative focusing on the European market, you will use your excellent communication skills and agritech knowledge to build meaningful relationships with clients. This role offers the flexibility of remote work and the potential for a sponsored visa to the Netherlands after a year.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Generate new business opportunities through cold calling and other sales techniques.
* Establish and maintain relationships with European clients, understanding their needs and how Seed-X can meet them.
* Present and articulate the value of Seed-X's solutions clearly and concisely.
* Work independently, managing your time effectively in a fast-paced environment.
* Show cultural adaptability and build connections with people from diverse backgrounds.

**Requirements:**

* Minimum one year of sales experience, preferably B2B, with a proven track record in sales.
* Fluent in English with a US/UK accent, capable of effective communication with European clients.
* Skilled in written communication and telephonic communication with clients.
* Knowledge of agritech is highly desirable.
* Ability to work remotely and independently.
* Cultural awareness and adaptability to engage effectively with a diverse client base.

**Application Process:**  
Interested candidates should submit a resume and a two-minute video to priyanka@seed-x.com. In your video, introduce yourself, highlight your passion for agriculture and sales, and explain why you're a great fit for Seed-X's European sales team.

**Join us at Seed-X Technologies** and be part of our journey to revolutionize the seed industry through cutting-edge technology and innovation.

title: Sales Representative
description:
**About MoEngage**



MoEngage is an intelligent customer engagement platform, built for customer-obsessed marketers and product owners. We enable hyper-personalization at scale across multiple channels like mobile push, email, in-app, web push, on-site messages, and SMS. With AI-powered automation and optimization, brands can analyze audience behavior and engage consumers with personalized communication at every touchpoint across their lifecycle.



Fortune 500 brands and Enterprises across 35 countries such as Deutsche Telekom, Samsung, Ally Financial, Vodafone, and McAfee along with internet-first brands such as Flipkart, Ola, OYO, and Bigbasket use MoEngage to orchestrate their cross-channel campaigns and engage efficiently with their customers sending 50 billion messages to 500 million consumers every month!



Our vision is to build the world’s most trusted customer engagement platform for the mobile-first world.



We promise to care about your customers as much as you do. And that justifies our top ratings for service and support in Gartner Magic Quadrant, Gartner Peer Insights, and G2 Summer Reports. We have also been recognized as one of the 25 Highest Rated Private Cloud Computing Companies To Work For in a list released by Battery Ventures, a global investment firm based on the employee feedback on Glassdoor where employees reported the highest levels of satisfaction at work during the first six months of the pandemic.

  


**Sales Development Representative**



MoEngage is looking for a highly motivated senior sales development representative (SDR) for the North America region. The Senior SDR will be reporting into the SDR Manager for North America, and the key responsibilities are generating sales qualified leads and pipeline through a mix of outbound and inbound prospecting activities. The North American team is small and growing so there are many opportunities to move into different roles as the team builds. This role will have a fast track path for being an Account Executive within 12 months should objectives be met.

  


**Responsibilities**


* Generate sales qualified opportunities and pipeline through a mix of outbound and inbound prospecting activities
* Account mapping/sourcing qualified leads that fit our target personas
* Develop new business via telephone and mass communication such as email, research and social media to introduce our company’s product and services and identify appropriate buyers within the target market.
* Analyze and identify how MoEngage can solve our prospects’ engagement and retention challenges.
* Identify key buying influencers within these prospects to determine budget and timeline.
* Build and cultivate prospect relationships by initiating communications and conducting follow-up communications in order to move opportunities through the sales funnel.
* Work with the marketing team in converting inbound leads for handoff to sales.
* Work with the Sales Development Manager to develop and grow the sales pipeline to consistently meet weekly/monthly/quarterly revenue goals along with other KPIs
* Manage data for new and prospective clients in CRM, ensuring all communications are logged, information is accurate, documents are attached, and sales development dashboards are up to date.
* Share best practice processes across the team and adopt new best practices for success.

  


**Requirements**


* Must be based in the US or Canada (preferrably in Boston)
* At least 2-3 years of relevant experience
* A bachelor’s degree
* Previous SDR experience at a SaaS company
* Experience using a CRM (customer relationship management) system, web-conferencing software, sales prospecting and enablement tools
* Ability to work in a fast-paced and ever-changing remote environment
* You’re comfortable collaborating with multiple teams, including sales development, marketing, and sales to help drive results
* Strong listening, conversation, and presentation skills
* Excellent organizational and time management skills

As we expand our market presence, we are seeking dynamic and motivated individuals to join our team as Medical Representatives.

**Position Overview:**  
We are currently looking for enthusiastic and self-motivated Medical Representatives to promote and sell our range of eye drops to healthcare professionals, including ophthalmologists, optometrists, and pharmacists. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills, along with a strong understanding of the pharmaceutical sales process.

**This position is primarily commission-based, offering an exciting opportunity for individuals who are driven by results and eager to excel in the field of eye care sales.**

**Responsibilities:**

* Promote and sell our portfolio of eye drops to healthcare professionals, effectively communicating the features, benefits, and therapeutic value of our products.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers in target accounts, including ophthalmology clinics, optometrist practices, and retail pharmacies.
* Identify new business opportunities and develop strategic sales plans to expand market share and achieve sales targets.
* Provide educational support to healthcare professionals through product demonstrations, presentations, and training sessions.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, customer service, and medical affairs, to ensure the successful execution of sales strategies and initiatives.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field.
* Previous experience in pharmaceutical or medical device sales, preferably in the field of ophthalmology or optometry.
* Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets and driving business growth.
* Strong understanding of the sales process, including prospecting, negotiation, and closing techniques.
* Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work independently and manage a territory effectively.
* Flexibility to travel within the assigned territory as needed.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive commission structure with unlimited earning potential.
* Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
* Flexible work schedule with autonomy and independence in managing your territory.

**Join Our Team:**  
If you are passionate about making a difference in the lives of patients and thrive in a fast-paced, results-driven environment, we want to hear from you! Join us in our mission to revolutionize eye care and become a valued member of our dynamic team of medical representatives.

title: Tellecaller
company: MAAC – Maya Academy of Advanced Cinematics
description:
As a Telecaller, you will be responsible for reaching out to potential customers over the phone to promote products or services, generate leads, and facilitate sales. Your primary objective will be to engage prospects, build rapport, and convey information effectively to achieve sales targets and customer satisfaction.

\\*Responsibilities:\\*

1. \\*Outbound Calls:\\* Make outbound calls to prospective customers using a prepared script to introduce products or services and generate interest.

2. \\*Lead Generation:\\* Identify and qualify leads through cold calling, warm calling, and follow-up calls. Gather relevant information such as customer needs, preferences, and buying intentions.

3. \\*Product/Service Presentation:\\* Present product features, benefits, and pricing information persuasively to potential customers. Address any queries or concerns they may have and provide accurate information.

4. \\*Sales Conversion:\\* Utilize effective sales techniques to persuade prospects to make a purchase or schedule appointments for further discussions with sales representatives.

5. \\*Customer Relationship Management:\\* Maintain a database of customer information, interactions, and feedback. Follow up with customers to ensure satisfaction, resolve issues, and encourage repeat business.

6. \\*Achieving Targets:\\* Meet or exceed daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets set by the management. Continuously strive to improve performance and contribute to the overall sales team objectives.

7. \\*Documentation:\\* Record details of all calls, including outcomes, in the CRM system or designated software. Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of customer interactions and sales activities.

8. \\*Adherence to Policies:\\* Adhere to company policies, guidelines, and compliance standards while conducting calls and handling customer information. Ensure ethical and professional conduct at all times.

\\*Qualifications:\\*

- High school diploma or equivalent. Bachelor's degree preferred.

- Proven experience in telemarketing, sales, or customer service role preferred.

- Excellent verbal communication skills with a clear and pleasant telephone manner.

- Persuasive and convincing ability to influence customer decision-making.

- Strong negotiation and objection handling skills.

- Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

- Proficiency in basic computer skills and familiarity with CRM software or call center systems.

- Results-oriented mindset with a strong focus on achieving targets and delivering exceptional customer service.

\\*Benefits:\\*

- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.

- Comprehensive training and ongoing support.

- Opportunities for career advancement and growth within the organization.

- Dynamic and collaborative work environment with a diverse team.

title: Sales Executive
description:
**ABOUT GAINERS INDIA** 

Gainers India is Real estate company, dealing in residential as well as commercial properties. We are channel partners for multiple brands such as M3M, BPTP, Whiteland, Anant Raj, Signature etc.

We can provide invaluable assistance in buying or selling a property. We have the knowledge, experience, and resources to guide you through the process and ensure a successful outcome. We can help you save time, money, and stress while making sure everything is done properly and on time.

**LOCATION** 

DLF Corporate Greens, Office No. 1001, 10th Floor, Tower 4, Sector 74, Gurgaon, Haryana

**Job Overview:**

We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Channel Sales Representative to join our growing real estate team. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in expanding our market presence through effective channel development and sales strategies. If you are a highly motivated individual with a passion for real estate and proven experience in channel sales, we invite you to apply.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Channel Development:**

* Identify and establish strategic partnerships with key channel partners, including real estate agencies, brokers, and other relevant stakeholders.
* Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing partners while actively seeking new collaboration opportunities.

**Sales and Revenue Generation:**

* Drive channel sales by effectively promoting real estate properties to partners and end customers.
* Achieve and exceed sales targets through the development and execution of comprehensive sales strategies.

**Market Analysis:**

* Conduct market research to identify potential channels and market trends.
* Provide insights into competitor activities and market conditions to inform sales strategies.

**Training and Support:**

* Provide training and support to channel partners on product knowledge, sales techniques, and market positioning.
* Collaborate with internal teams to ensure partners have the necessary tools and resources for successful sales.

**Negotiation and Contract Management:**

* Lead negotiations with channel partners to establish mutually beneficial agreements.
* Ensure the proper execution and management of contracts and agreements.

**Reporting and Analysis:**

* Generate regular reports on channel performance, sales metrics, and market trends.
* Analyze data to make informed decisions and recommendations for continuous improvement.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
* Proven experience in channel sales.
* Excellent negotiation and communication skills.
* Goal-oriented.

title: Marketing Executive
description:
**Job Title:** Marketing Executive

**Location:** Pune, India

**Company Overview:**  
Yoga De Temple is a leading yoga studio based in Pune, dedicated to promoting holistic well-being and mindfulness through the practice of yoga. We are currently seeking a dynamic and charismatic Marketing Executive (Pref. F) to join our team and help us expand our reach and impact in the community.

**Job Description:**  
As a Marketing Executive at Yoga De Temple, you will be responsible for developing and implementing creative marketing strategies to attract new clients and promote our studio's offerings. We are seeking a candidate who not only possesses strong marketing skills but also embodies the values of health, wellness, and positivity that our studio represents. This position offers an exciting opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the lives of others while contributing to the growth and success of our business.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and execute marketing plans and campaigns to drive awareness, engagement, and enrollment in our yoga classes, workshops, and events.
* Create compelling content for digital marketing channels, including social media, email newsletters, blog posts, and website updates, to showcase the unique benefits of our studio and yoga practices.
* Cultivate relationships with local businesses, community organizations, and influencers to establish partnerships and collaborations that promote our brand and expand our reach.
* Organize and participate in promotional events, outreach activities, and networking opportunities to connect with potential clients and build a strong presence in the local community.
* Monitor and analyze marketing metrics, such as website traffic, social media engagement, and conversion rates, to measure the effectiveness of marketing efforts and identify areas for improvement.
* Stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging opportunities to enhance our marketing strategies and stay ahead of the curve.
* Collaborate with internal teams, including instructors, administrators, and customer service representatives, to ensure alignment and consistency in messaging and brand image.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
* Proven experience in marketing roles, preferably in the health, wellness, or fitness industry.
* Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to communicate effectively with diverse audiences.
* Creative thinking and a passion for developing innovative marketing strategies and campaigns.
* Excellent writing and editing skills with a keen eye for design and visual aesthetics.
* Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, including social media management, email marketing, and website content management systems.
* Knowledge of local market dynamics and a network of contacts in the Pune area is a plus.
* A positive attitude, high energy, and a genuine passion for yoga and holistic well-being.
* Presentable demeanor.

This is a full-time position based in Pune, offering competitive compensation and opportunities for professional growth and development. If you are a charismatic and creative individual with a passion for marketing and a love for yoga, we would love to hear from you. Join us in spreading the joy of yoga and making a difference in the lives of others!

The candidate should have a background in sales, particularly within the software and IT training industry. The primary responsibility of this role is to generate revenue by selling our comprehensive range of training programs to Colleges, Businesses and Individuals. The candidate should have strong understanding of the local market dynamics, good presentation and communication skills, understanding of software and IT training solutions.

title: Field Sales Representative
description:
**Company Description**  
KOSH is a leading new-age microfinance lender catering specifically to the blue-collar segment. With a strong presence in urban, semi-urban, rural, and rural unbanked areas, KOSH aims to provide financial inclusion and empowerment to individuals who are traditionally underserved by mainstream financial institutions. Operating across 21 states in India, KOSH is rapidly expanding its reach and impact.

At KOSH, we understand the unique financial needs of the blue-collar workforce and strive to offer them accessible and tailored financial solutions. Our innovative approach, combined with a customer-centric focus, sets us apart in the microfinance industry. By leveraging technology and a deep understanding of local communities, we empower individuals to improve their livelihoods and contribute to the overall economic growth of the country.  
To learn more about KOSH and our mission to create a positive impact on the lives of the blue-collar workforce,  
please visit our website at https://getkosh.com/

**Job Description** **Responsibilities:**  
-Generate group loans by traveling to assigned on-field locations Conduct marketing activities to generate leads and expand the customer base.  
-Travel extensively within the assigned territory, including urban, semi-urban, and rural areas, to meet customers and promote KOSH's products.  
-Educate customers about loan terms, eligibility criteria, repayment schedules, and other relevant information.

title: Customer Service Representative
description:
**Company Description**

We are Hiring only Local Candidates for **Ahmedabad, Gujarat Location** and **Female candidates** only.

We are hiring candidates for our **Ahmedabad Branch office.**

**Role Description**

The Customer Service Representative is responsible for providing excellent customer service and ensuring customer satisfaction. They serve as the primary point of contact for customers, addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and assisting in product/service selection. The role requires exceptional communication and problem-solving skills to effectively handle customer interactions.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, and live chat in a timely and professional manner.
* Provide accurate and up-to-date information on products, services, and promotions.
* Assist customers in placing orders, processing returns, and resolving any order-related issues.
* Resolve customer complaints by investigating the cause, identifying solutions, and following through to ensure customer satisfaction.
* Collaborate with other departments, such as Sales or Technical Support, to resolve complex customer issues or escalate when necessary.
* Maintain customer records and update information in the CRM system accurately.
* Actively listen to customer feedback and identify opportunities for improvement in products or processes.
* Provide after-sales support by tracking shipments, coordinating with logistics partners, and ensuring timely delivery.

**Qualifications and Skills:**

* High school diploma or equivalent; additional education in customer service or related field preferred.
* Proven customer support experience or experience in a similar role is an advantage.
* Excellent oral and written communication skills.
* Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
* Ability to handle stressful situations and difficult customers with professionalism and empathy.
* Proficient in using CRM software and other customer support tools.
* Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
* Ability to work effectively in a team environment and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
* Flexibility to adapt to changing business needs and work schedules, including evenings, weekends, and holidays.

title: Zonal Head
description:
We are seeking a dynamic and experienced professional to join our team as a Zonal Head for the loan industry. The Zonal Head will be responsible for overseeing and driving the business growth and operations within their designated zone, ensuring compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements, and leading a high-performing team of loan professionals.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Business Development:** Develop and execute strategies to achieve sales targets, expand market share, and increase the company's presence within the zone.
* **Team Leadership:** Lead, motivate, and mentor a team of loan officers and sales representatives to drive performance and achieve organizational goals.
* **Relationship Management:** Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders including clients, partners, and regulatory authorities to foster business growth and ensure customer satisfaction.
* **Risk Management:** Monitor and assess loan portfolios within the zone to identify and mitigate potential risks, ensuring compliance with regulatory guidelines and company policies.
* **Market Analysis:** Stay abreast of market trends, competitor activities, and industry developments to identify opportunities for growth and innovation.
* **Operational Efficiency:** Streamline processes and implement best practices to optimize operational efficiency and enhance customer experience.
* **Performance Monitoring:** Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to track the performance of the zone and individual team members, providing regular reports and insights to senior management.
* **Training and Development:** Provide ongoing training, coaching, and support to team members to enhance their skills and capabilities, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
* **Budget Management:** Develop and manage the budget for the zone, ensuring effective allocation of resources and adherence to financial targets.
* **Compliance and Ethics:** Ensure strict adherence to legal and regulatory requirements, as well as company policies and ethical standards, across all operations within the zone.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, or a related field; MBA preferred.
* Proven track record of experience in a leadership role within the loan industry.
* Strong understanding of loan products, credit risk management, and regulatory compliance.
* Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.
* Demonstrated ability to drive business growth, achieve targets, and manage a diverse team effectively.
* Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make informed decisions.
* Results-oriented with a passion for delivering exceptional customer service and achieving excellence.

3. Market Expansion:  

a. Drive Horizontal Expansion with respect to number of outlets opened versus target to improve business in the coming years.  

b. Take up the responsibility of opening new outlets during market visits and provide necessary support in terms of elements, discounts, coolers etc.  

c. Drive conversion of high value/ high visibility outlets to Depth Outlets (Happy Deal, Vision 2020, Teen & College Outlets, Outlets in Emerging Channels) and ensure execution as per Company norms  

d. Market share gain through various ground level interventions such as driving outlet level billing vertically & horizontally.
4. Market Execution: Execute Channel Programmers, Promotional activities for the given set of outlets. Plan for merchandising elements, coolers based on outlets/ market requirements and as per the RED standards. Prepare MGR wise action plans for improving RED (Right Execution) parameters, HE etc.
5. People Management:  

a. Carry out on job trainings with Market growth representatives (Off Role) to improve Execution skills on the job. Track PJP (Permanent Journey Plan) Compliance and other productivity Metrics of the team and provide inputs to improve the same via OJT  

b. Evaluate performance and skills of MDs and provide inputs via on-the-job coaching, training etc.  

c. Conduct Joint Weekly, Monthly Review with ASM to review performance wrt Sales, Execution Parameters of MDs and work on agreed actions.  

d. Review Performance and market issues to be resolved via daily Gate Meetings
6. Budget Management:  

a. Propose Discount spend for given set of outlets to drive business. Closely monitor customer outstanding and claims and ensure compliance to credit and other policies.
7. Asset Control: Ensure regular tracking of our Assets and ensure asset movements etc in compliance to the Asset Policy.
8. Distribution Management: In routine ensure monitoring distributor ROI, SKU wise margins, DMS (Distribution Management System), scheme spend distributor to market outlets.* 


**Supervises:** Market Growth Representatives and Account Developers

**Direct Reports:** No

**Grade (Internal Reference):** 7

**Geographical Scope: Kolhapur**

**Reports To:** Area Sales Manager

**Business Knowledge:** Knowledge of Sales & Distribution preferably in an FMCG Company

  

Job Requirement
**Qualifications:** Graduation/PG  

**Experience:** 4 to 8 years  

**Functional Skills:**  

* Planning and Organizing
* Relationship Management
* Presentation Skills
* Good communication & Coordination Skills
* Team worker
* Influencing Skills
* Strong Analytical skills
**Travel:** 70% traveling**Job Requirement**

title: Loan Manager
description:
**About us**: **IIBS Group** is a one-of-a-kind entity providing financial services ranging from business development to insurance coverage, investment and day-to-day transactions.

A strategic business partner providing a broad range of services to address every business need with effectiveness. We provide help with fundraising, business solutions, taxation and advice on managing finances and risks along with planning and executing strategies to enhance efficiency in industries or businesses' operational and financial management etc.

title: Sales Manager
description:
The role of a Sales Manager in the hospitality industry is critical for driving revenue growth, building client relationships, and maximizing sales opportunities. Here's an overview of the responsibilities and duties of a Sales Manager in the hospitality industry:

**Developing Sales Strategies**:

* Formulating and implementing sales strategies to achieve revenue targets and increase market share.
* Analyzing market trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to identify sales opportunities and develop effective sales plans.

**Lead Generation and Prospecting**:

* Generating leads through various channels such as cold calling, networking, referrals, and online research.
* Prospecting potential clients, including corporate accounts, event planners, travel agencies, and group organizers, to expand the customer base and increase sales opportunities.

**Client Relationship Management**:

* Building and maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients to foster loyalty and repeat business.
* Understanding clients' needs, preferences, and objectives to provide personalized solutions and enhance customer satisfaction.

**Sales Presentations and Proposals**:

* Preparing and delivering compelling sales presentations, proposals, and pitches to showcase the value proposition of the hospitality establishment.
* Customizing sales proposals based on clients' requirements, budgets, and preferences to secure bookings and contracts.

**Negotiation and Contract Management**:

* Negotiating pricing, terms, and contracts with clients to maximize revenue and profitability while ensuring customer satisfaction.
* Drafting and finalizing contracts, agreements, and booking terms in accordance with company policies and legal requirements.

**Sales Team Leadership and Training**:

* Leading and motivating the sales team to achieve sales targets and performance goals.
* Providing guidance, coaching, and training to sales representatives to enhance their sales skills, product knowledge, and customer service capabilities.

**Collaboration with Other Departments**:

* Collaborating with other departments such as marketing, operations, and finance to align sales efforts with overall business objectives.
* Communicating customer feedback, market insights, and sales opportunities to relevant departments for strategic planning and decision-making

**Sales Reporting and Analysis**:

* Monitoring sales performance, analyzing sales data, and generating sales reports to track progress against targets and identify areas for improvement.
* Using sales analytics and KPIs to evaluate the effectiveness of sales strategies, assess market trends, and make data-driven recommendations for sales optimization.

**Attendance at Industry Events and Networking**:

* Representing the hospitality establishment at industry events, trade shows, and networking functions to promote brand awareness and generate business leads.
* Building relationships with key industry stakeholders, influencers, and decision-makers to expand the business network and explore partnership opportunities.

**Adherence to Policies and Standards**:

* Ensuring compliance with company policies, ethical standards, and industry regulations in all sales activities and interactions.
* Upholding the reputation and integrity of the hospitality establishment by conducting business with honesty, professionalism, and integrity.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹18,000.00 - ₹45,000.00 per month

Schedule:

* Day shift

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

* Hospitality Sales: 1 year (Required)

title: Lead Generation Specialist
description:
Business Development Representative (BDR)/Lead Generation Specialist

(Min 3 – 5 years of Experience)

**Job Description**

As a Business Development Representative (BDR), you will play a pivotal role in

driving the growth of our company by generating and qualifying leads within the B2B

space. Your primary responsibility will involve outbound prospecting, engaging

potential clients, and setting up appointments or opportunities for the sales team.

You'll be an integral part of the business development function, contributing directly

to the company's revenue goals.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Outbound Prospecting:**

 Utilize various channels (phone, email, social media) to conduct targeted

outreach to potential clients within the provided B2B database.

 Research and identify key decision-makers and influencers within target

organizations.

**Sales Experience:**

Any previous sales roles, particularly those involving outbound calling. This

could include roles in telemarketing, inside sales, or even direct sales where

relationship-building and persuasion were key elements.

**Client Relationship Management:**

Experience in managing client relationships, even if it's not directly in a sales capacity.

Roles that involved communication, understanding client needs, and providing

solutions are valuable.

**Lead Qualification:**

 Engage prospects in meaningful conversations to assess their needs,

challenges, and potential fit for our products/services.

 Qualify leads based on established criteria and effectively prioritize them for

further engagement.

**Appointment Setting:**

 Schedule high-quality appointments, demos, or meetings for the sales team

with qualified leads.

 Maintain accurate records of interactions and appointments in the CRM

system.

**Collaboration and Communication:**

 Collaborate closely with the sales and marketing teams to align strategies and

messaging.

 Provide valuable insights and feedback from prospect interactions to improve

targeting and messaging.

**Continuous Learning and Improvement:**

 Stay updated on industry trends, market conditions, and competitor offerings.

 Continuously refine outreach strategies and techniques to improve lead

conversion rates.

**Qualifications:**

 Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or

related field preferred.

 Experience: Previous experience in a similar outbound sale, lead generation,

or customer-facing role is advantageous.

 Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Ability to articulate value propositions effectively.

 Sales Acumen: Understanding of sales processes, lead qualification, and

pipeline management.

 Tech Proficiency: Familiarity with CRM software (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot)

and proficiency in using various communication tools.

 Resilience: Ability to handle rejection, persistency in outreach efforts, and a

positive, proactive attitude.

title: Tsi- Trissur
description:
Home to the world's best loved and trusted hygiene, health, and nutrition brands. Our purpose defines why we exist: to protect, heal and nurture in the relentless pursuit of a cleaner, healthier world. We are a global team united by this purpose.


Join us in our fight to make access to the highest quality hygiene, wellness, and nourishment a right and not a privilege.

**Sales**
---------

Our Sales teams help to deliver Reckitt's purpose by building shared success with our customers, making access to the highest quality hygiene, wellness, and nourishment possible in-stores and online.  

  

Within Sales, we're focused on achieving outperformance across all of our channels, operating in highly competitive categories. This focus results in a dynamic, fast paced environment where cross functional teams are encouraged to collaborate to achieve success.  

  

We have around 10,000 sales people across the world, within market roles and ranging in areas like Field Sales, Key Accounts, Trade Marketing and Category Development.


**About the role**
------------------



Ready to take the lead in the field? Reckitt is looking for a dynamic Field Sales Supervisor to inspire and coach a team dedicated to expanding our in-store presence and exceeding sales targets. With your strategic thinking, focus on what matters and ability to engage teams, you'll be at the forefront of driving our innovative health, hygiene, and nutrition brands into the hands of consumers. Your expertise will not only nurture an inclusive, high-performing sales team but also make a real impact on our global mission of making lives better.


**Your responsibilities**
-------------------------



In summary, you'll:  

* Drive sales performance, guiding your team to exceed targets and fostering a culture of success.
* Craft and execute field sales strategies that maximise reach and visibility across your territory.
* Lead engaging training sessions, elevating the skills and expertise of your field sales representatives.
* Dive into sales analysis, using insights to steer future strategies and optimise performance.
* Facilitate collaboration across departments ensuring unified support for all sales initiatives.

**The experience we're looking for**
------------------------------------


* Demonstrated success in field sales, particularly within the consumer goods sector.
* A leader at heart, capable of motivating and managing a team to achieve greatness.
* Strong communicator, able to build trust and influence both your team and stakeholders.
* A deep understanding of sales analytics and the ability to translate data into action.
* Degree-educated in Business, Marketing, or a related discipline, your academic background underpins your practical know-how.


**The skills for success**
--------------------------



Ecommerce, Analysing sales planning and execution, Relationship building and stakeholder management, Analytical mindset for market trends and data interpretation, Effective communication.


**What we offer**
-----------------



With inclusion at the heart of everything we do, working alongside our four global Employee Resource Groups, we support our people at every step of their career journey, helping them to succeed in their own individual way.


We invest in the wellbeing of our people through parental benefits, an Employee Assistance Program to promote mental health, and life insurance for all employees globally. We have a range of other benefits in line with the local market. Through our global share plans we offer the opportunity to save and share in Reckitt's potential future successes. For eligible roles, we also offer short-term incentives to recognise, appreciate and reward your work for delivering outstanding results. You will be rewarded in line with Reckitt's pay for performance philosophy.

**Equality**
------------



We recognise that in real life, great people don't always 'tick all the boxes'. That's why we hire for potential as well as experience. Even if you don't meet every point on the job description, if this role and our company feels like a good fit for you, we still want to hear from you.



All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, disability or medical condition; colour, ethnicity, race, citizenship, and national origin; religion, faith; pregnancy, family status and caring responsibilities; sexual orientation; sex, gender identity, gender expression, and transgender identity; protected veteran status; size or any other basis protected by appropriate law.
